welcome: Welcome to the Software Engineering Master Exam App!
about_us_text: This app is designed to provide comprehensive notes and questions for the Master's degree in Software Engineering exam. We strive to provide you with the best educational resources and tools to help you succeed.
reset_password_text: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
signup_text: Create an account to access all features of the app.
sign_in_text: Please enter your credentials to access your account.
sign_up_text: Please fill in the form to create an account.
password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
password_strength: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
email_sent: A password reset link has been sent to your email address.
password_reset_success: Password reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
